definition/examples: Name of the project
Overall description of the project
person(s) responsible for contact including their affiliation
Species of the sample
Unique dataset identifier
Mass spectrometer & manufacturer
What post-translational modifications were done if applicable
Type of file uploaded (e.g. RAW, SEARCH, RESULT, etc.)
ESI, MALDI or other ionisation source including relevant parameters
ID number of the publication associated with the dataset
Analyzer & activation/dissociation type
short description of sample preparation including extraction;separation;enrichment;clean-up;digestion and mass spectrometry protocols
short description of bioinformatics pipeline;software tools including versions;main search parameters and quantitative analysis
source: ProteomeXchange Consortium Guidelines; Adapted from MIAPE

definition/examples: description of the growth protocol or organism preparation
description of the treatments applied to the organism prior to sample acquisition
description of the extraction of proteins from the treated sample(s)
description of the separation of proteins and/or peptides
description of the digestion of the proteins into peptides
description of the acquisition of mass spectra from the peptide sample
list of parameter names
